main event: A 14-year-old girl observed a bright, flashing object near Crystal Lake, Michigan, for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The girl described the object as enormous and circular, moving north toward a nearby island. The object illuminated the area brightly before it disappeared, leaving her frightened and alone., The sound associated with the object was a loud buzz with a predominant note at around 600 cps., The object hovered, blinked, and made sharp climbing turns at high speed before vanishing., The sighting was reported to involve military flight activity in the area at the time., There was speculation that the object might have been an aircraft, but it was not identified as a conventional aircraft.
